flawed_nl_solution:
There are 25 - 5 = <<25-5=20>>20 layers of rock that are not limestone.
Half of those 20 are sandstone, so there are 20 / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10 that are not limestone or sandstone.
Four of those are quartz, so 10 - 4 = <<10-4=8>>8 layers are not limestone, sandstone, or quartz.
Half of the rest are shale, so 8 / 2 = <<8/2=4>>4 kinds of rock remain that make up only one layer in the strata.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
